Class MiscUtils

java.lang.Object
  anidbcmdc.util.MiscUtils

public class MiscUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Title: MiscUtils

Description: Some misc utils like add an array to an ArrayList or merge two Arrays. This class is just a container for static methods.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2005

public static java.util.ArrayList addArrayToArrayList(java.util.ArrayList v,
                                                      java.lang.Object[] obj)
Adds an Object Array to an ArrayList.

Parameters:
v - - The ArrayList.
obj - - The Object array that should be added at the end of the ArrayList.
Returns:
- The merged ArrayList. Warning: You must cast every single Object inside the ArrayList to your class.

Parameters:

second - - The Second Array.
